alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:18PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Huron, Ottawa, northeastern Seneca, Erie, Sandusky, northern Wood and Lucas Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1018 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Perrysburg to near Clyde to 8 miles south of Bellevue. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding is likely in areas of poor drainage. Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Sandusky, Norwalk, Fremont, Western Vermilion, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Bellevue, Clyde, Rossford, Willard, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse and Oak Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Erie; Huron; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood
